title: Law of Sines
text: The Law of Sines relates the ratios of the sides of a triangle to the sines of their opposite angles.

hintAnswer: No, the Law of Sines doesn't apply.
title: Applying Law of Sines
text: If you have two sides and the included angle (SAS), would the Law of Sines still be helpful, or would another rule be more appropriate?
choices: The Law of Sines works here because you have two sides.
No, the Law of Sines doesn't apply.
